cmp: 丰 (buxom/good-looking/appearance and carriage of a person, (surname)/abundant/plentiful/great)
mng: point of a spear, edge of a tool, vanguard, forward (in sports team)

exm.mng: to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat, measure for measure
sharp (e.g. knife blade), incisive, to the point
cutting edge or point of a knife, sword or tool
Tse Ting-Fung or Nicholas Tse (1980-), Cantopop star
to cross swords, to have a confrontation (with sb)
